markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Temporary Tool](/Spells.aspx?ID=2369)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 260

**Tradition**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1)

**Deities**
[Amaznen](/Deities.aspx?ID=404), [Bharnarol](/Deities.aspx?ID=467), [Brigh](/Deities.aspx?ID=333), [Findeladlara](/Deities.aspx?ID=461), [Magrim](/Deities.aspx?ID=450), [Ptah](/Deities.aspx?ID=638), [Wheels Of Innovation](/Deities.aspx?ID=385), [Zogmugot](/Deities.aspx?ID=508)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute or until used
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure a temporary simple [tool](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2759), such as a shovel or [rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2748) into your hands. It lasts until it’s used for a single activity or for 1 minute, whichever comes first, after which it disappears. The tool is obviously temporarily conjured and thus can’t be sold or passed off as a genuine item.
name: Temporary Tool

summary_markdown: You conjure a temporary simple [tool](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2759), such as a shovel or [rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2748) into your hands.
text: Temporary Tool Source Divine Mysteries pg. 260 Tradition Arcane Deities Amaznen, Bharnarol, Brigh, Findeladlara, Magrim, Ptah, Wheels Of Innovation, Zogmugot Cast 1 minute Duration 1 minute or until used --- You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands. It lasts until it’s used for a single activity or for 1 minute, whichever comes first, after which it disappears. The tool is obviously temporarily conjured and thus can’t be sold or passed off as a genuine item.
